overview: Around 200 Swedes volunteered to fight as SS soldiers for Germany. Who were they? What happened to them during and after the war? Waffen-SS became known for massacres and ethnic cleansing. Documents reveal that Swedish SS soldiers knew at the time of the Holocaust, but the information was classified. Families and some of the Swedes themselves tell us through recordings, letters and diaries.
title: Hitlers Svenska soldater
